<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201920</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">General Quiz in Greek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemeiner Quiz auf Griechen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu général dans le Grec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz geral no grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz generale in greco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων στα ελληνικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso general en griego</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The quiz includes 5 levels of general questions (History, Arts, Athletics, Geography, Sciences, Music). The difficulty of the questions increases depending on the level. Each level includes 10 questions, that are marked proportionally (Level 1:1 point, Level 2:2 points, etc). The maximum points a player can gather is 150. In order to pass to the next level, 50% of correct answers is needed. The quiz is addressed to individuals who are preparing for examinations in general knowledge subjects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>el</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Quiz schließt 5 Stufen der allgemeinen Fragen
ein (Geschichte, künste, Athletik, Geographie, Wissenschaften, 
Musik). Die Schwierigkeit der Fragen erhöht sich abhängig von 
der Stufe. Jede Stufe schließt 10 Fragen, die werden 
gekennzeichnet proportional ein (der waagerecht ausgerichteter 1:1 
Punkt, Stufe 2:2 Punkte, usw.). Das Maximum zeigt einen Spieler 
kann erfassen ist 150. Um zur folgenden Stufe zu überschreiten,
ist 50% von korrekten Antworten erforderlich. Der Quiz wird an 
Einzelpersonen gerichtet, die für Prüfungen in den 
Allgemeinwissenthemen sich vorbereiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu inclut 5 niveaux des questions générales 
(histoire, arts, athlétisme, géographie, sciences, musique). 
La difficulté des questions augmente selon le niveau. 
Chaque niveau inclut 10 questions, celle sont marqués 
proportionnellement (point de 1:1, points de niveau 2:2, etc.. de 
niveau). Le maximum dirige un joueur peut recueillir est 150. 
Afin de passer au prochain niveau, 50% de réponses correctes 
est nécessaire. Le jeu est adressé aux individus qui se 
préparent aux examens en général les sujets de la connaissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O quiz inclui 5 níveis de perguntas gerais 
(history, artes, athletics, geografia, ciências, música). A 
dificuldade das perguntas aumenta dependendo do nível. Cada 
nível inclui 10 perguntas, aquela é marcado proporcional (ponto de 
1:1, pontos do nível 2:2, etc. nivelados). O máximo aponta um 
jogador pode recolher é 150. A fim passar ao nível seguinte, 
50% de respostas corretas é needed. O quiz é dirigido aos 
indivíduos que se estão preparando para examinações em assuntos do
conhecimento geral.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il quiz include 5 livelli delle domande generali 
(storia, arti, atletismo, geografia, scienze, musica). La 
difficoltà delle domande aumenta secondo il livello. Ogni 
livello include 10 domande, quella è contrassegnato proporzionalmente
(punto di 1:1, punti del Livello 2:2, ecc Livelli). Il massimo 
indica un giocatore può riunire è 150. Per passare al
livello seguente, 50% delle risposte corrette è necessario. Il 
quiz è indirizzato agli individui che stanno preparandosi per gli 
esami degli oggetti di conoscenza generale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων περιλαμβάνει 5 επίπεδα γενικών 
ερωτήσεων (ιστορία, τέχνες, αθλητισμός, γεωγραφία, επιστήμες, 
μουσική). Η δυσκολία των ερωτήσεων αυξάνεται ανάλογα με το 
επίπεδο. Κάθε επίπεδο περιλαμβάνει 10 ερωτήσεις, οι οποίες
είναι χαρακτηρισμένες αναλογικά (σημείο επιπέδων 1:1, σημεία 
επιπέδων 2:2, κ.λπ...). Το μέγιστο δείχνει έναν φορέα 
μπορεί να συλλέξει είναι 150. Προκειμένου να περάσει στο
επόμενο επίπεδο, 50% των σωστών απαντήσεων απαιτείται. Ο
διαγωνισμός γνώσεων απευθύνεται στα άτομα που προετοιμάζονται για
τις εξετάσεις στα γενικά θέματα γνώσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El concurso incluye 5 niveles de las preguntas 
generales (historia, artes, atletismo, geografía, ciencias, música).
La dificultad de las preguntas aumenta dependiendo del nivel. 
Cada nivel incluye 10 preguntas, de que está marcado 
proporcional (punta de 1:1, las puntas del nivel 2:2, etc llanos). 
El máximo señala a jugador puede recolectar es 150. Para
pasar al nivel siguiente, el 50% de respuestas correctas es necesario.
El concurso se trata a los individuos que se están preparando 
para las examinaciones en temas del conocimiento general.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
